arts.ttl: Charlton one point off play-off places after beating Bristol Rovers
arts.sum: Two first-half goals led to a comfortable victory for the south London side.

arts.ttl: Charlie Methven makes Charlton Athletic transfer admission in final week of January window
arts.sum: Charlton are yet to make any fresh additions to their squad this winter but have let Terry Taylor and Nathan Asiimwe leave on loan to Northampton and Walsall, respectively. “You’ll speak to them one day and they’ll say: ‘Yes, we can let that player go to you on loan or on a permanent.’

arts.ttl: Bolton Wanderers close to Championship striker swoop, Charlton Athletic also keen
arts.sum: Bolton Wanderers are closing in on a deal for Cardiff City striker Kion Etete, a fresh report from… The post Bolton Wanderers close to Championship striker swoop, Charlton Athletic also keen appeared first on The72 - Football League News.

arts.ttl: I really do’ - Charlton boss Jones on Tyreece Campbell reaching first-team century milestone
arts.sum: Charlton Athletic manager Nathan Jones has talked about Tyreece Campbell recently reaching the milestone of 100 first-team matches for the football club. It is a wonderful milestone – 100 games for Charlton Athletic, this historic and wonderful club.
